Title: Apple iPhone 11 (Red, 64 GB)
Features: 15.49 cm (6.1 inch) Liquid Retina HD Display
Dual 12MP Camera System: Ultra Wide and Wide cameras
A13 Bionic chip with 3rd generation Neural Engine
IP68 water and dust resistant (up to 2 meters for 30 minutes)

Title: Apple iPhone 11 (Purple, 128 GB)
Features: 6.1-inch Liquid Retina HD display with True Tone
Advanced dual-camera system with Night mode and Deep Fusion
Face ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay
Up to 17 hours video playback, 10 hours streamed video playback
Fast-charge capable (up to 50% charge in 30 minutes with 20W adapter or higher, sold separately)

Title: Apple iPhone 11 (White, 64 GB)
Features: Capture stunning photos and 4K videos with the dual-camera system
Powered by the super-fast A13 Bionic chip
Supports spatial audio playback and Dolby Atmos
Comes with iOS 13 (upgradable to latest iOS versions)
